home.maintenance_description: We're tightening some nuts and bolts round the back. We'll be back up and running soon.

toastify.switched: You have switched to the right network

burn.label: Choose the number of XEN batches you want to burn

toastify.token_added: The token was added in your wallet
toastify.error: There was an error. Try again later
toastify.address_copied: The address ID was copied successfully

toastify.info: Your transaction is pending. Your fees should arrive shortly

toastify.rejected: You rejected the transaction. Fees were not claimed.

rewards.title: Your rewards
rewards.claim_description: Unclaimed DXN is considered automatically staked. Only claim when you want to trade.

toastify.info: Your transaction is pending. Your rewards should arrive shortly
toastify.transaction_error: Transaction relayer error. Please try again
toastify.rejected: You rejected the transaction. Rewards were not claimed.

stake.init_text: Make sure you have DXN tokens in your wallet before you can stake them.

toastify.success: Your succesfully approved contract for staking.
toastify.error: Contract couldn't be approved for staking!
toastify.info: You rejected the transaction. Contract hasn't been approved for staking.
toastify.transaction_error: You rejected the transaction. Your tokens haven't been staked.
toastify.rejected: You rejected the transaction. DXN were not staked.
toastify.stake_info: Your transaction is pending. Your DXN should be staked shortly
toastify.stake_transaction_error: Transaction relayer error. Please try again

toastify.info: Your transaction is pending. Your DXN should be unstaked shortly
toastify.transaction_error: Transaction relayer error. Please try again
toastify.rejected: You rejected the transaction. Your tokens haven't been unstaked.
